data.title: Explained: Who Are Yemen's Houthis, and Why Are They Attacking Israel?
data.meta_description: Despite Being Situated 2,000 Kilometers South of Israel, the Houthi Movement Has Now Launched a Deadly Drone Strike on Tel Aviv and Several Attacks Toward the Resort City of Eilat. Experts Explain Why This Is in Line With Its Wider anti-Israel, Antisemitic Agenda, and Why It Is More Partner Than Proxy for Patron Iran
